channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WordPress Backup and Migrate Plugin – Backup Guard
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WordPress Backup and Migrate Plugin – Backup Guard

item.title: CVE-2021-24155|2024-08-03T19:21:18.269Z -- unknown -- wordpress%20backup%20and%20migrate%20plugin%20%E2%80%93%20backup%20guard
item.description: The WordPress Backup and Migrate Plugin – Backup Guard WordPress plugin before 1.6.0 did not ensure that the imported files are of the SGBP format and extension, allowing high privilege users (admin+) to upload arbitrary files, including PHP ones, leading to RCE.
